alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 2:16PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Baldwin County through 300 PM CDT... At 216 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Elberta, or 6 miles east of Foley, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orange Beach and Elberta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
